snippet: Finance ministers and central bank governors met amid mounting alarm that the euro-zone crisis and Washington’s failure to deal with soaring deficits could endanger the fragile global recovery.
abstract: Finance ministers and central bank governors from the Group of 20 meet in Mexico City amid mounting alarm that the euro-zone crisis and Washington’s failure to deal with soaring deficits could endanger the fragile global recovery; meeting, coming right before leadership transitions in the United States and China, is not expected to produce any major agreement.
lead_paragraph: Finance ministers and central bank governors met amid mounting alarm that the euro-zone crisis and Washington’s failure to deal with soaring deficits could endanger the fragile global recovery.

headline.seo: Officials at G-20 in Mexico City Warn About Debt
headline.main: Officials at G-20 Meeting Warn About Debt in Europe and U.S.
headline.print_headline: Officials at G-20 Meeting Warn About Debt in Europe and U.S.
